channel.title: Can I get unbanned
channel.description: Hello, I recently got banned for practically no reason :mad: I do know what I did wrong but it was an accident! I had an IP changer program activated and i was going through my tabs, and looked at moparscape it said "Sorry manmade, you are banned from using this forum! bant Your ban is not set to expire" So i thought, "oh well its just bcause i am using a proxy ip" so i take it off, then check and I am still banned :(. I cannot even logout to make a new account. So please could somebody unban manmade! I didn't mean any harm whats so ever. I am currently at my friends house, and this is how i am making this thread ( obviously ) I will try to check this thread as much as possible and hopefully you mods/admins will understand and unban my account. ones again, I am SORRY it was an accident, accidents happen.

item.title: Can I get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Your account does not appear to be banned. Clear your cookies and cache and try and log in again.

Read full topic

item.title: Can I get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

1ns again? With that kind of laziness you shouldn’t even be welcome here. And there are several alternatives. One, clear your cookies so you’re no longer logged in, find the email address of a staff member, and email them. Second, join the IRC (ignore the pricks who flame you) and talk to a staff member there.

Read full topic

item.title: Can I get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @rusha rusha
item.description:
@rusha wrote:

“Well, I don’t see a reason of why not makign another account to try and appeal a ban on my account that i don’t deserve. And 1ns again IT WAS AN ACCIDENT” without quotes

Read full topic

item.title: Can I get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Well now you’re not going to get unbanned, because you broke the rules by creating a new account.

Read full topic

item.title: Can I get unbanned
item.dc:creator: @rusha rusha
item.description:
@rusha wrote:

Hello, I recently got banned for practically no reason :mad: I do know what I did wrong but it was an accident! I had an IP changer program activated and i was going through my tabs, and looked at moparscape it said “Sorry manmade, you are banned from using this forum!
bant
Your ban is not set to expire”
So i thought, “oh well its just bcause i am using a proxy ip” so i take it off, then check and I am still banned :(. I cannot even logout to make a new account. So please could somebody unban manmade! I didn’t mean any harm whats so ever. I am currently at my friends house, and this is how i am making this thread ( obviously ) I will try to check this thread as much as possible and hopefully you mods/admins will understand and unban my account. ones again, I am SORRY it was an accident, accidents happen.
